data.text: @TindallSara My older daughter received notification this week from her university that her program of study is required to be vaccinated in order to fully participate. She has already gotten both jabs, but I am glad to see that some colleges are taking a science-based approach.
@AnjaliEnjeti @TindallSara Mine is 14. I am really hopeful now that he will be vaccinated before school begins again in August. Maybe sooner.
@TindallSara I can’t wait to get my youngest vaccinated
